title: What are we in this universe? - Quora

response.answer_text: “What are we in this universe?” Whatever we can identify with, from an abstract concept such as the infinitely expanded ‘immaterial absoluteness’ which is the formless source of all knowledge, time and space, all the way down to the idea of an elementary particle, an atom, thus seeing ourselves as an infinitely limited, small and insignificant singular cell lost somewhere in the humongous universal body. We are THAT which is infinite, real and never divided, but only if we let it happen by surrendering our ego-sense, the boundary which keeps us in the skin feeling and unbearably limited by collective consciousness, our Human Artificial Intellect.  Hari ॐ  @~The Genuine Original Dreamer~@
